mapper.select: SELECT id, Product_order_number, purchase_name, purchase_stardard, material, unit, amount, hope_end_data, apply_id, Product_id, single_price, sum_price, qualified_id, qualified_number, qualified_date, check_attachment, state FROM ztt_purchase WHERE 1=1

SELECT id, Product_order_number, purchase_name, purchase_stardard, material, unit, amount, hope_end_data, apply_id, Product_id, single_price, sum_price, qualified_id, qualified_number, qualified_date, check_attachment, state FROM ztt_purchase WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ztt_purchase ( id, Product_order_number, purchase_name, purchase_stardard, material, unit, amount, hope_end_data, apply_id, Product_id, single_price, sum_price, qualified_id, qualified_number, qualified_date, check_attachment, state ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{Product_order_number}, #{purchase_name}, #{purchase_stardard}, #{material}, #{unit}, #{amount}, #{hope_end_data}, #{apply_id}, #{Product_id}, #{single_price}, #{sum_price}, #{qualified_id}, #{qualified_number}, #{qualified_date}, #{check_attachment}, #{state} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ztt_purchase SET Product_order_number = #{Product_order_number}, purchase_name = #{purchase_name}, purchase_stardard = #{purchase_stardard}, material = #{material}, unit = #{unit}, amount = #{amount}, hope_end_data = #{hope_end_data}, apply_id = #{apply_id}, Product_id = #{Product_id}, single_price = #{single_price}, sum_price = #{sum_price}, qualified_id = #{qualified_id}, qualified_number = #{qualified_number}, qualified_date = #{qualified_date}, check_attachment = #{check_attachment} WHERE id=#{id}

UPDATE ztt_purchase
Product_order_number = #{Product_order_number},
purchase_name = #{purchase_name},
purchase_stardard = #{purchase_stardard},
material = #{material},
unit = #{unit},
amount = #{amount},
hope_end_data = #{hope_end_data},
apply_id = #{apply_id},
Product_id = #{Product_id},
single_price = #{single_price},
sum_price = #{sum_price},
qualified_id = #{qualified_id},
qualified_number = #{qualified_number},
qualified_date = #{qualified_date},
check_attachment = #{check_attachment},
state = #{state},
supply_name = #{supply_name},
WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM ztt_purchase WHERE id IN
#{item}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ztt_purchase ( id, Product_order_number, purchase_name, purchase_stardard, material, unit, amount, hope_end_data, apply_id, Product_id, single_price, sum_price, qualified_id, qualified_number, qualified_date, check_attachment ) VALUES
( #{item.id}, #{item.Product_order_number}, #{item.purchase_name}, #{item.purchase_stardard}, #{item.material}, #{item.unit}, #{item.amount}, #{item.hope_end_data}, #{item.apply_id}, #{item.Product_id}, #{item.single_price}, #{item.sum_price}, #{item.qualified_id}, #{item.qualified_number}, #{item.qualified_date}, #{item.check_attachment} )

update.foreach: UPDATE ztt_purchase SET Product_order_number = #{item.Product_order_number}, purchase_name = #{item.purchase_name}, purchase_stardard = #{item.purchase_stardard}, material = #{item.material}, unit = #{item.unit}, amount = #{item.amount}, hope_end_data = #{item.hope_end_data}, apply_id = #{item.apply_id}, Product_id = #{item.Product_id}, single_price = #{item.single_price}, sum_price = #{item.sum_price}, qualified_id = #{item.qualified_id}, qualified_number = #{item.qualified_number}, qualified_date = #{item.qualified_date}, check_attachment = #{item.check_attachment} WHERE id=#{item.id}

UPDATE ztt_purchase
Product_order_number = #{item.Product_order_number},
purchase_name = #{item.purchase_name},
purchase_stardard = #{item.purchase_stardard},
material = #{item.material},
unit = #{item.unit},
amount = #{item.amount},
hope_end_data = #{item.hope_end_data},
apply_id = #{item.apply_id},
Product_id = #{item.Product_id},
single_price = #{item.single_price},
sum_price = #{item.sum_price},
qualified_id = #{item.qualified_id},
qualified_number = #{item.qualified_number},
qualified_date = #{item.qualified_date},
check_attachment = #{item.check_attachment},
WHERE id=#{item.id}
